tool_description: Reverse IP Lookup, Subdomain enumeration, IP Geolocation
name: IP-Ninja
title: IP-Ninja

api_list.name: Get all hostnames hosted on a given IP address
api_list.description:
Return every hostnames tied to a given IP address and its ASN.

Note that some IPs aren't tied to an ASN (some IP ranges are direct allocations from the regional internet registry and not assigned to ISPs or other entities that typically have ASNs), in that case ASN would be null.

api_list.name: Find hostnames hosted on a given ASN
api_list.description: Returns all hostnames whose IPs are part of the given ASN.

api_list.name: Find all subdomains for a given domain name
api_list.description: Find all subdomains for a given domain name

api_list.name: Get all IPv4 and IPv6 addresses tied to a hostname
api_list.description: Returns the list of all IPv4 addresses and the list of all IPv6 addresses for a given hostname.

api_list.name: Get IP address geolocation
api_list.description:
Obtain geolocation data for a given IP adress.

If the IP address can't be geolocated for any reason (for example reserved or private addresses) a HTTP 404 code will be returned.

In some cases where geolocation data is approximative fields such as `city`, `postal_code` or `subdivision` may be `nul`.

api_list.name: Get IP address ASN
api_list.description:
Returns the ASN associated with the given IP address.

If there are no ASN for that IP address, a 404 status code is returned.
